programme.title: The Smoot-Hawley Tariff Act of 1930
programme.short_synopsis: The protectionist Smoot-Hawley Tariff Act of 1930.
programme.medium_synopsis: The Smoot-Hawley Tariff Act, which forced foreign automobile manufacturers to build their models for export to America in America, with American parts and labour.

programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
